sentence.Network_cn: 这是一家大型跨国企业的全资子公司。

entry.def: A multinational company has branches or owns companies in many different countries.

entry.tran: (军队、组织或团体)人员来自不同国家的，国际的
entry.def: Multinational armies, organizations, or other groups involve people from several different countries.

example.ex: The US troops would be part of a multinational force.
example.tran: 美军将是多国部队的一个组成部分。

entry.def: Multinational countries or regions have a population that is made up of people of several different nationalities.

means.word_mean: 1. involving or operating in several nations or nationalities;

sentences.en: foreign multinationals operating in the UK
sentences.cn: 在英国经营的外国跨国公司

sentences.en: The firm was taken over by a multinational consulting firm.
sentences.cn: 这家公司被一个跨国咨询公司收购。

sentences.en: Many multinational companies have substantial operations in this area.
sentences.cn: 许多跨国公司都在该地区从事相当规模的经营。

sentences.en: These local companies are only small fry compared with the huge multinationals.
sentences.cn: 同那些跨国公司比,这些当地的公司不过是小鱼小虾。
